description: A standard medical claim form used by healthcare providers in the US to bill health insurance companies for medical services.

service_start_date.description: The service start date from item 24A in YYYY-MM-DD format

service_end_date.description: The service end date from item 24A in YYYY-MM-DD format

units.description: The number of units from item 24G

epsc_family_plan.description: The EPSDT family plan field from item 24H

date_of_service.description: The date the service was provided

place_of_service.description: The place the service was provided

charge_amount.description: The charge amount for the procedure

insurance_program.description: The insurance program from item 1: Medicare, Medicaid, CHAMPUS, CHAMPVA, Group Health Plan

insured_id_number.description: The insured's ID number from item 1a

patient_name.description: The patient's name from item 2 in Last Name, First Name, Middle Initial format

patient_date_of_birth.description: The patient's date of birth from item 3 in YYYY-MM-DD format

insured_name.description: The insured's name from item 4 in Last Name, First Name, Middle Initial format

patient_relationship_to_insured.description: The patient's relationship to insured from item 6

insured_address.description: The insured's address from item 7 including No.,Street, City, State, Zip Code

insured_phone_number.description: The insured's phone number, including area code from item 7

other_insured_name.description: The other insured's name from item 9

other_insured_employer_or_school.description: The other insured's employer or school 9c

other_insured_insurance_plan_name.description: The other insured's plan or program name from item 9d

patient_condition_related_to.description: Whether the patient's condition is related to employment, auto accident, or other accident from item 10

insured_policy_feca_number.description: The insured's policy group or FECA number from item 11

insured_date_of_birth.description: The insured's policy or group number from item 11a

insured_insurance_plan_name.description: The insured's plan name or program name from item 11c

another_health_benefit_plan_indicator.description: d. IS THERE ANOTHER HEALTH BENEFIT PLAN? Yes or No from item 11d

patient_signature.description: patient's or authorized person's signature from item 12

patient_signed_date.description: patient's or authorized person's signature date from item 12

insured_signature.description: The insured's or authorized person's signature from item 13

insured_signed_date.description: The insured's or authorized person's signed date from item 13

illness_injury_date.description: The date of current illness, injury, or pregnancy from item 14 in YYYY-MM-DD format

previous_illness_date.description: The date of a previous similar illness from item 15 in YYYY-MM-DD format

unable_to_work_start_date.description: The dates the patient was unable to work from item 16

unable_to_work_end_date.description: The dates the patient was unable to work until item 16

referring_physician.description: The name of the referring physician from item 17

referring_physician_id.description: The ID number of the referring physician from item 17a

hospitalization_start_date.description: The hospitalization start date related to current services from item 18

hospitalization_end_date.description: The hospitalization end date related to current services from item 18

local_use_field_2.description: The local use field from item 19

is_outside_lab_indicator.description: Are there outside lab charges? from item 20

outside_lab_charges.description: Whether outside lab was used and charges from item 20

diagnosis_1.description: The diagnosis or nature of illness or injury from item 21.1

diagnosis_2.description: The diagnosis or nature of illness or injury from item 21.2

diagnosis_3.description: The diagnosis or nature of illness or injury from item 21.3

diagnosis_4.description: The diagnosis or nature of illness or injury from item 21.4

medicaid_original_ref_number.description: Medicaid - Original ref no. from item 22

prior_authorization_number.description: The prior authorization number from item 23

medical_procedures.description: The list of medical procedures from the table in item 24

tax_id_type.description: The tax ID type (SSN or EIN) from item 25

tax_id_number.description: The federal tax ID number (SSN or EIN) from item 25

patient_account_number.description: The patient's account number from item 26

accept_assignment_indicator.description: Whether assignment is accepted from item 27

total_charges.description: The total charges in dollars from item 28

amount_paid.description: The amount paid in dollars from item 29

balance_due.description: The balance due in dollars from item 30

physician_signature.description: The physician or supplier's signature from item 31

facility_name_and_address.description: The name and address of facility where services were rendered from item 32

physician_name_address_and_phone.description: The physician/supplier's billing name, address, zip code and phone number from item 33
